ARABIC: ٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Know that Allah is fierce in retribution and that Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Know that the punishment of God is severe, but that God is also forgiving and kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Know well that Allah is severe in retribution, and that Allah is also All-Forgiving, All-Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Know that God is stern in His retribution and He is All-forgiving and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Know well that Allah’s punishment is severe, and that Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Know that Allah is severe in punishment and that Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Know that Allah is severe in requiting (evil) and that Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Know God is terrible in retribution, and God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Know that Allah is severe in punishment, but that Allah (also) is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Know that God is severe in punishment, yet most forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Know that Allah is severe in chastising and that Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Know that Allah is severe in retribution, and that Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Know ye that Allah is strict in punishment and that Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Know that Allah is Severe in punishment and that Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Know that Allah is Stern in retribution, and that Allah is the Forgiver and the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Know that God is severe in retribution, and that God is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:98] Know that God is severe in punishment, of His enemies, and that God is Forgiving, to His friends, Merciful, to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Know that Allah is severe in punishment) towards him who declares lawful that which Allah has made unlawful, (but that Allah (also) is Forgiving) He overlooks mistakes, (Merciful) towards the person who repents.
